scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: pm2 update && pm2 start ./etc/apps.json && pm2 start npm --no-automation --name 'API Gateway' -- run start-proxy
scripts.start:prod: pm2 update && pm2 start ./etc/apps.json --env production && pm2 start npm --env production --no-automation --name 'API Gateway' -- run start-proxy
